Package <Unnamed>

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FileIO<Class>
    FileIO is an abstract class which requires all the child class to implement it's abstract method.
    Guest
    Represents a Guest added to the System.
    GuestFileIO  
    GuestMenu
    GuestMenu is a sub class of Menu class, which handles all the Guests registered in the hotel.
    HRPSApp
    The Main Entry point of the programme
    Menu
    Main Menu of the whole system.
    MenuFileIO
    MenuFileIO handles input and output of data into MenuList.txt
    MenuItem
    Represents a Menu item added to the Menu.
    Payment
    Represents the Payment.
    PaymentFileIO
    PaymentFileIO handles input and output of data into PaymentRates.txt
    PaymentMenu
    Payment Menu which allows the staff to update and print the payment rates and total price.
    Reservation
    Represents a Reservation added to the System.
    ReservationFileIO
    ReservationFileIO handles input and output of data into Reservationlist.txt
    ReservationMenu
    ReservationMenu is a sub class of Menu class, which handles all the reservation in the hotel.
    Room
    Represents the Room.
    Room_deluxe
    Represents the Room: Deluxe.
    Room_double
    Represents the Room: Double.
    Room_single
    Represents the Room: Single.
    Room_vip
    Represents the Room: VIP.
    RoomFileIO
    RoomFileIO handles input and output of data into RoomList.txt
    RoomMenu
    RoomMenu is a sub class of Menu class, which handles all the Room in the hotel.
    RoomService
    Represents the Room Service added to the Menu.
    RoomServiceMenu
    RoomServiceMenu is a sub class of Menu class, which handles all the RoomService in the hotel.
    ServiceFileIO
    ServiceFileIO handles input and output of data into RoomServiceList.txt
